name: Ambilight
description: Transform your Jellyfin viewing experience with synchronized ambient lighting via WLED
overview: Automatic ambilight effects for movies and TV shows with real-time WLED control

versions.changelog:
Initial release
- In-process C# ambilight extraction and playback
- Per-device WLED mappings with individual LED configurations
- Real-time color synchronization
- Automatic extraction of new videos
- Multi-zone support for multiple WLED controllers
